channel.title: Start up i.p
channel.description: Im trying to get my own server up and running, but i can not figure out how i change the start up i.p. on the client, Example, When i start the client it says Server I.p. 127.0.0.0(I think), How do i change it to where it open with my No-ip.biz name? Its a 317 server. If you could answer it would be very helpfull

item.title: Start up i.p
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Go to the EGUI or GUI file and find 127.0.0.1 and replace it with you’rs/you’re own.

Read full topic

item.title: Start up i.p
item.dc:creator: @taken taken
item.description:
@taken wrote:

No, i mean what files do i have to change? it was somone elses file and they released it. But the client opens up with 127.0.0.0, i want it to open up with flamin-pkz.no-ip.biz, What file do i need to get into to do it? and how if possible to tell me.

Read full topic

item.title: Start up i.p
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I’f you already made the Port and Ip try using 0.0.0.0 its usually that 0.0.0.0 is the Owners ip. While i’f you made you’re other IP example: Examplescape.hopto.org or Examplescape.no-ip.biz is for the Players.

Read full topic
